DOC.brief_summary: To investigate relative bioavailability ibuprofen ( FDC ) film-coated tablet ibuprofen caffeine vs. tablet ibuprofen ( Brufen® ) tablet ibuprofen lysinate ( Nurofen Immedia® ) .
DOC.brief_title: Relative Bioavailability Ibuprofen From Single Fixed Dose Combination Tablet Ibuprofen Caffeine Compared Single Tablets Ibuprofen Ibuprofen Lysinate
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Healthy male female subject Age 18 50 year Body mass index ( BMI ) 18.5 29.9 kg/m2 Subjects must able understand comply study requirement Exclusion criterion : Any relevant deviation healthy condition
